message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its unique features and capabilities are unparalleled in the market. To ensure we align on value, I propose an initial offer of $1500000 for the product. This generous offer reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the opportunity it presents for you to gain a significant advantage in your endeavors. I look forward to discussing this proposal with you further.

Thank you for presenting your flagship product, Alice. I appreciate the value and craftsmanship you've mentioned. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $1200000 for this product. I'm looking forward to discussing this further.
